00021 #define  oct_test_list_lock_init(plock)    cavium_spin_lock_init((plock))
00022 #define  oct_test_list_lock(plock)         cavium_spin_lock_softirqsave((plock))
00023 #define  oct_test_list_unlock(plock)       cavium_spin_unlock_softirqrestore((plock))

00073 #define   NODE_IN_USE   1
00074 #define   NODE_IS_FREE  0
00075 
00076 
00077 struct test_node {
00078 
00079     void       *next;         /* Next item in linked list. */
00080     void       *tptr;         /* Pointer to test specific data structure */
00081 
00082     int        node_status;
00083 
00084 #ifdef  TEST_LIST_DEBUG
00085     char       dbg_func[80];  /* Debug - Function that made last call. */
00086     int        dbg_line;      /* Debug - Line number of last call */
00087 #endif
00088 } ;
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 struct test_list {
00094 
00095     oct_test_lock_t     lock;
00096 
00097     struct test_node   *head, *tail; /* Pointer to start and end of list. */
00098 
00099     int                 node_count;  /* Total number of nodes initialized */
00100 
00101     int                 avail_count; /* Total available nodes. */
00102 
00103 };

00122 extern struct test_node *
00123 __get_next_node(struct test_list *tl);
00124 
00125 extern int
00126 __put_free_node(struct test_list  *tl, struct test_node *tn);
00127 
00128 #define        peek_node(tl)          (tl->head)

00131 
00132 
00133 #ifdef TEST_LIST_DEBUG
00134 #define  get_next_node(tl)                                 \
00135     ({                                                     \
00136         struct test_node *n = __get_next_node((tl));       \
00137         if(n) {                                            \
00138             oct_test_strcpy(n->dbg_func, __FUNCTION__);    \
00139             n->dbg_line  = __LINE__;                       \
00140         }                                                  \
00141         n;                                                 \
00142     })
00143 
00144 
00145 #define  put_free_node(tl, tn)                             \
00146     ({                                                     \
00147         int ret = __put_free_node((tl), (tn));             \
00148         if((tl) && (tn)) {                                 \
00149             oct_test_strcpy((tn)->dbg_func, __FUNCTION__); \
00150             (tn)->dbg_line  = __LINE__;                    \
00151         }                                                  \
00152         ret;                                               \
00153     })
00154 
00155 #else
00156 
00157 #define  get_next_node(tl)           __get_next_node((tl))
00158 #define  put_free_node(tl, tn)       __put_free_node((tl), (tn))
00159 
00160 #endif
00161 
00162 
00163 #endif
